Description: Jefferson Apartments is located at 6166 Leesburg Pike Falls Church, VA and is managed by Capital Investment Advisors, LLC, a reputable property management company with verified listings on RENTCafe. Jefferson Apartments offers studio to two bedroom apartments ranging in size from 600 to 1,200 sq.ft. Amenities include Central Air Conditioning, Central Domestic Hot Water, Swimming Pool, Clubhouse, Fitness Center, and more. This rental community is pet friendly, welcoming both cats and dogs, and is located in the 22204 ZIP code. For more details, contact our office at (703) 534-8020 or use the online contact form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Description: Cavalier Club is a beautiful and well maintained 12 story high-rise located in Falls Church, VA. We are minutes away from Arlington, Alexandria, Tyson's Corner and Downtown DC. We offer a wide array services for your convenience; an office staff with over 20 years of customer service experience, 24 hour emergency maintenance, and many other great amenities and features for you to enjoy. All Utilities are included- Gas, Water, Electric, Sewer and Trash. Cavalier Club has No gimmicks, NO hidden charges, NO amenity charges. Be a STAR! Stop in, tour, apply and rent Today!

Address: [3012 Patrick Henry Dr, Falls Church, VA 22044](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/(paste+your+address+here,+it+should+be+however+google+formats+it,+for+example+for+the+Empire+State+Building+use+350+5th+Ave+New+York,+NY+10118)/3012+Patrick+Henry+Dr,+Falls+Church,+VA+22044/data=!4m2!4m1!3e2)

Description: Welcome to Hollybrooke Apartments. Our community is nestled in a vibrant neighborhood surrounded by shopping, dining, sprawling parks, bike trails, and plenty of entertainment. We have an ideal location for the lifestyle you want.Our apartment homes provide options to meet the needs of almost anyone looking for a new home. To make life easier, our homes are complete with sleek designs and spacious floorplans. We also offer lavish master bedrooms, spacious walk-in closets, large living rooms and gourmet kitchens with upgraded appliances. So you always feel like coming home is a joy, this meticulously landscaped community offers a professional onsite staff and 24 hour emergency maintenance. Located in prestigious Falls Church Virginia, only minutes from Washington DC attractions, fine restaurants, offices, shops and entertainment, this community has access to Washington DC's main arteries of I-395 and Hwy 50. Come home to quality and affordable Arlington Virginia apartment living! An AH

Description: Come see this quaint condo located in beautiful Falls Church! Walking distance to shops and restaurants. 1 mile to the EFC Metro. Half mile to Target. Less than a half mile to the popular Eden Center. Close to all major streets for easy access. Competitive price! Condo fees and most of the utilities included in the rent! Tenant pays Electric. New carpet throughout plus new tile new fixtures.

Description: Remodeled 1 Bed 1 Bath w/stacked washer/dryer New Paint duct work cleaned & professionally cleaned. Kitchen-granite counters/stainless steel appl s w/large picture window over looking quiet & green street. Hardwoods built ins for TV area in Fam Rm & library collection--this place has it all for close in city living. .9 mile to East Falls Church Metro. 2 Parking Permits.
